feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
